projects.name: IrvineHacks MealMate
projects.description: Introducing MealMate! Your best friend for finding recipe to make use of the ingredients you have! MealMate has an AI powered Object Detection model for images that would use the ingriedients to suggest a recipe. (In Development)

projects.name: Security Camera System
projects.description: A security camera system that would auto detect people, start recording, and allow for easy searching of footage from their cameras.

projects.name: ZotSearch
projects.description: A search engine for UC Irvine related resources
